content: this pattern should fit most swiffer mops if it is too short/long for your mop head adding or subtracting from the bobble portion should fix your problem one skein of peaches and cream cotton with make one cover with just a couple of yards left over please message me here on ravelry or email me at knotsofrainbows@gmail com with questions you may sell any item made from this pattern however do not claim it as your own and please give me credit also you may not use my photos as your own
